alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 10:51PM PST until January 13 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 9 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of to 8 to 14 inches at higher passes on Highway 3 in the Horn. Up to 5 inches are possible on passes on the 299, notably Buckhorn and Oregon Mtn. A couple inches of wet, slushy snow is possible at lower elevations early Saturday Morning. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 9 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lower snow levels are possible in the Trinity Horn, notably around Trinity Lake, Carrville, and Coffee Creek.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
